resources.string: Rich, bold shot of pure coffee with a smooth, intense flavour.
Smooth espresso diluted with hot water for a bold taste.
Creamy milk mixed with coffee for a smooth, mild drink.
Light, foamy top with a rich body and a well-rounded, velvety taste.
A perfect balance of rich coffee and steamed milk.
Rich chocolate blended with smooth coffee and steamed milk.
Sharp shot of coffee marked with a touch of milk for balance.
Slowly brewed coffee served cold for a smooth, refreshing taste.
Hot water topped with a shot of strong coffee for a bold flavour.
Finely ground coffee simmered to create a strong brew.
